scripts.package-win: npm run build && electron-packager . --overwrite --asar=true --platform=win32 --arch=ia32 --icon=public/images/icons/wallet-icon.ico --prune=true --out=release-builds --version-string.CompanyName=CE --version-string.FileDescription=CE --version-string.ProductName="Safex Community Wallet"
scripts.make-mac-installer: mkdir -p installers && npm run package-mac && electron-installer-dmg ./release-builds/SafexWallet-darwin-x64/SafexWallet.app SafexWallet --out=installers --overwrite --icon=public/images/icons/wallet-icon.icns --background=public/images/icons/bg.jpg
scripts.make-win-installer: mkdir -p installers && npm run package-win && node createWinInstaller.js
scripts.make-all-installers: mkdir -p installers && npm run build && electron-packager . --overwrite --platform=darwin --arch=x64 --icon=public/images/icons/wallet-icon.icns --prune=true --out=release-builds && electron-packager . --overwrite --asar=true --platform=win32 --arch=ia32 --icon=public/images/icons/wallet-icon.ico --prune=true --out=release-builds --version-string.CompanyName=CE --version-string.FileDescription=CE --version-string.ProductName="Safex Community Wallet" && electron-installer-dmg ./release-builds/SafexWallet-darwin-x64/SafexWallet.app SafexWallet --out=installers --overwrite --icon=public/images/icons/wallet-icon.icns --background=public/images/icons/bg.jpg && node createWinInstaller.js && electron-packager . --overwrite --platform=linux --arch=x64 --icon=public/images/icons/wallet-icon.png --prune=true --out=release-builds
